#if $blast_options.check_bopts == 'True' \#-----BLAST and Exonerate Statistics Thresholds blast_type=ncbi+ \#set to 'wublast' or 'ncbi'
#if $blast_options.pcov_blastn pcov_blastn=$blast_options.pcov_blastn \#Blastn Percent Coverage Threhold EST-Genome Alignments #else pcov_blastn=0.8 \#Blastn Percent Coverage Threhold EST-Genome Alignments #end if #if $blast_options.pid_blastn pid_blastn=$blast_options.pid_blastn \#Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Aligments #else pid_blastn=0.85 \#Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Aligments #end if #if $blast_options.eval_blastn eval_blastn=$blast_options.eval_blastn \#Blastn eval cutoff #else eval_blastn=1e-10 #Blastn eval cutoff #end if #if $blast_options.bit_blastn bit_blastn=$blast_options.bit_blastn \#Blastn bit cutoff #else bit_blastn=40 #Blastn bit cutoff #end if
#if $blast_options.pcov_blastx pcov_blastx=$blast_options.pcov_blastx \#Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold Protein-Genome Alignments #else pcov_blastx=0.5 #Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold Protein-Genome Alignments #end if #if $blast_options.pid_blastx pid_blastx=$blast_options.pid_blastx \#Blastx Percent Identity Threshold Protein-Genome Aligments #else pid_blastx=0.4 #Blastx Percent Identity Threshold Protein-Genome Aligments #end if #if $blast_options.eval_blastx eval_blastx=$blast_options.eval_blastx \#Blastx eval cutoff #else eval_blastx=1e-06 #Blastx eval cutoff #end if #if $blast_options.bit_blastx bit_blastx=$blast_options.bit_blastx \#Blastx bit cutoff #else bit_blastx=30 #Blastx bit cutoff #end if
#if $blast_options.pcov_rm_blastx pcov_rm_blastx=$blast_options.pcov_rm_blastx \#Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold For Transposable Element Masking #else pcov_rm_blastx=0.5 #Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold For Transposable Element Masking #end if #if $blast_options.pid_rm_blastx pid_rm_blastx=$blast_options.pid_rm_blastx \#Blastx Percent Identity Threshold For Transposbale Element Masking #else pid_rm_blastx=0.4 #Blastx Percent Identity Threshold For Transposbale Element Masking #end if #if $blast_options.eval_rm_blastx eval_rm_blastx=$blast_options.eval_rm_blastx \#Blastx eval cutoff for transposable element masking #else eval_rm_blastx=1e-06 #Blastx eval cutoff for transposable element masking #end if #if $blast_options.bit_rm_blastx bit_rm_blastx=$blast_options.bit_rm_blastx \#Blastx bit cutoff for transposable element masking #else bit_rm_blastx=30 #Blastx bit cutoff for transposable element masking #end if
#if $blast_options.pcov_tblastx pcov_tblastx=$blast_options.pcov_tblastx \#tBlastx Percent Coverage Threhold alt-EST-Genome Alignments #else pcov_tblastx=0.8 #tBlastx Percent Coverage Threhold alt-EST-Genome Alignments #end if #if $blast_options.pcov_tblastx pid_tblastx=$blast_options.pcov_tblastx \#tBlastx Percent Identity Threshold alt-EST-Genome Aligments #else pid_tblastx=0.85 #tBlastx Percent Identity Threshold alt-EST-Genome Aligments #end if #if $blast_options.eval_tblastx eval_tblastx=$blast_options.eval_tblastx \#tBlastx eval cutoff #else eval_tblastx=1e-10 #tBlastx eval cutoff #end if #if $blast_options.bit_tblastx bit_tblastx=$blast_options.bit_tblastx \#tBlastx bit cutoff #else bit_tblastx=40 #tBlastx bit cutoff #end if
#if $blast_options.eva_pcov_blastn eva_pcov_blastn=$blast_options.eva_pcov_blastn \#EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Coverage Threshold EST-Genome Alignments #else eva_pcov_blastn=0.8 #EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Coverage Threshold EST-Genome Alignments #end if #if $blast_options.eva_pid_blastn eva_pid_blastn=$blast_options.eva_pid_blastn \#EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Alignments #else eva_pid_blastn=0.85 #EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Alignments #end if #if $blast_options.eva_eval_blastn eva_eval_blastn=$blast_options.eva_eval_blastn \#EVALUATOR Blastn eval cutoff #else eva_eval_blastn=1e-10 #EVALUATOR Blastn eval cutoff #end if #if $blast_options.eva_bit_blastn eva_bit_blastn=$blast_options.eva_bit_blastn \#EVALUATOR Blastn bit cutoff #else eva_bit_blastn=40 #EVALUATOR Blastn bit cutoff #end if
#if $blast_options.ep_score_limit ep_score_limit=$blast_options.ep_score_limit \#Exonerate protein percent of maximal score threshold #else ep_score_limit=20 #Exonerate protein percent of maximal score threshold #end if #if $blast_options.en_score_limit en_score_limit=$blast_options.en_score_limit \#Exonerate nucleotide percent of maximal score threshold #else en_score_limit=20 #Exonerate nucleotide percent of maximal score threshold #end if #else \#-----BLAST and Exonerate Statistics Thresholds blast_type=ncbi \#set to 'wublast' or 'ncbi'
pcov_blastn=0.8 \#Blastn Percent Coverage Threhold EST-Genome Alignments pid_blastn=0.85 \#Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Aligments eval_blastn=1e-10 \#Blastn eval cutoff bit_blastn=40 \#Blastn bit cutoff
pcov_blastx=0.5 \#Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold Protein-Genome Alignments pid_blastx=0.4 \#Blastx Percent Identity Threshold Protein-Genome Aligments eval_blastx=1e-06 \#Blastx eval cutoff bit_blastx=30 \#Blastx bit cutoff
pcov_rm_blastx=0.5 \#Blastx Percent Coverage Threhold For Transposable Element Masking pid_rm_blastx=0.4 \#Blastx Percent Identity Threshold For Transposbale Element Masking eval_rm_blastx=1e-06 \#Blastx eval cutoff for transposable element masking bit_rm_blastx=30 \#Blastx bit cutoff for transposable element masking
pcov_tblastx=0.8 \#tBlastx Percent Coverage Threhold alt-EST-Genome Alignments pid_tblastx=0.85 \#tBlastx Percent Identity Threshold alt-EST-Genome Aligments eval_tblastx=1e-10 \#tBlastx eval cutoff bit_tblastx=40 \#tBlastx bit cutoff
eva_pcov_blastn=0.8 \#EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Coverage Threshold EST-Genome Alignments eva_pid_blastn=0.85 \#EVALUATOR Blastn Percent Identity Threshold EST-Genome Alignments eva_eval_blastn=1e-10 \#EVALUATOR Blastn eval cutoff eva_bit_blastn=40 \#EVALUATOR Blastn bit cutoff
ep_score_limit=20 \#Exonerate protein percent of maximal score threshold en_score_limit=20 \#Exonerate nucleotide percent of maximal score threshold #end if

\#-----Genome (Required for De-Novo Annotation) genome= \#genome sequence file in fasta format organism_type=$organism_type \#eukaryotic or prokaryotic. Default is eukaryotic
#if $reannotation_options.reannotate == 'True' \#-----Re-annotation Using MAKER Derived GFF3 genome_gff= \#re-annotate genome based on this gff3 file est_pass=$reannotation_options.est_pass \#use ests in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no altest_pass=$reannotation_options.altest_pass \#use alternate organism ests in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no protein_pass=$reannotation_options.protein_pass \#use proteins in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no rm_pass=$reannotation_options.rm_pass \#use repeats in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no model_pass=$reannotation_options.model_pass \#use gene models in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no pred_pass=$reannotation_options.pred_pass \#use ab-initio predictions in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no other_pass=$reannotation_options.other_pass \#passthrough everything else in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no #else \#-----Re-annotation Using MAKER Derived GFF3 genome_gff= \#re-annotate genome based on this gff3 file est_pass=0 \#use ests in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no altest_pass=0 \#use alternate organism ests in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no protein_pass=0 \#use proteins in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no rm_pass=0 \#use repeats in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no model_pass=0 \#use gene models in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no pred_pass=0 \#use ab-initio predictions in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no other_pass=0 \#passthrough everything else in genome_gff: 1 = yes, 0 = no #end if
\#-----EST Evidence (for best results provide a file for at least one) est= \#non-redundant set of assembled ESTs in fasta format (classic EST analysis) est_reads= \#unassembled nextgen mRNASeq in fasta format (not fully implemented) altest= \#EST/cDNA sequence file in fasta format from an alternate organism est_gff= \#EST evidence from an external gff3 file altest_gff= \#Alternate organism EST evidence from a separate gff3 file
\#-----Protein Homology Evidence (for best results provide a file for at least one) protein= \#protein sequence file in fasta format protein_gff= \#protein homology evidence from an external gff3 file
\#-----Repeat Masking (leave values blank to skip repeat masking) #if $model_org model_org=$model_org \#select a model organism for RepBase masking in RepeatMasker #else model_org=all \#select a model organism for RepBase masking in RepeatMasker #end if rmlib= \#provide an organism specific repeat library in fasta format for RepeatMasker repeat_protein=/isilon/biodiversity/pipelines/maker-2.10/maker-2.10/data/te_proteins.fasta \#provide a fasta file of transposable element proteins for RepeatRunner rm_gff= \#repeat elements from an external GFF3 file prok_rm=0 \#forces MAKER to run repeat masking on prokaryotes (don't change this), 1 = yes, 0 = no
\#-----Gene Prediction snaphmm= \#SNAP HMM file gmhmm= \#GeneMark HMM file augustus_species= \#Augustus gene prediction species model fgenesh_par_file= \#Fgenesh parameter file pred_gff= \#ab-initio predictions from an external GFF3 file model_gff= \#annotated gene models from an external GFF3 file (annotation pass-through) est2genome=$est2genome \#infer gene predictions directly from ESTs, 1 = yes, 0 = no protein2genome=$protein2genome \#gene prediction from protein homology (prokaryotes only), 1 = yes, 0 = no unmask=$unmask \#Also run ab-initio prediction programs on unmasked sequence, 1 = yes, 0 = no
\#-----Other Annotation Feature Types (features MAKER doesn't recognize) other_gff= \#features to pass-through to final output from an extenal GFF3 file
\#-----External Application Behavior Options #if $alt_peptide alt_peptide=$alt_peptide \#amino acid used to replace non standard amino acids in BLAST databases #else alt_peptide=C \#amino acid used to replace non standard amino acids in BLAST databases #end if cpus=1 \#max number of cpus to use in BLAST and RepeatMasker (not for MPI, leave 1 when using MPI)
\#-----MAKER Behavior Options max_dna_len=$max_dna_length \#length for dividing up contigs into chunks (increases/decreases memory usage) min_contig=$min_contig \#skip genome contigs below this length (under 10kb are often useless)
pred_flank=$pred_flank \#flank for extending evidence clusters sent to gene predictors AED_threshold=$AED_threshold \#Maximum Annotation Edit Distance allowed (bound by 0 and 1) min_protein=$min_protein \#require at least this many amino acids in predicted proteins alt_splice=$alt_splice \#Take extra steps to try and find alternative splicing, 1 = yes, 0 = no always_complete=$always_complete \#force start and stop codon into every gene, 1 = yes, 0 = no map_forward=$map_forward \#map names and attributes forward from old GFF3 genes, 1 = yes, 0 = no keep_preds=$keep_preds \#Add unsupported gene prediction to final annotation set, 1 = yes, 0 = no
split_hit=$split_hit \#length for the splitting of hits (expected max intron size for evidence alignments) softmask=1 \#use soft-masked rather than hard-masked (seg filtering for wublast) single_exon=$single_check.single_exon \#consider single exon EST evidence when generating annotations, 1 = yes, 0 = no #if $single_check.single_exon == '1' single_length=$single_check.single_length \#min length required for single exon ESTs if 'single_exon is enabled' #else single_length=250 \#min length required for single exon ESTs if 'single_exon is enabled' #end if
retry=$retry \#number of times to retry a contig if there is a failure for some reason clean_try=0 \#remove all data from previous run before retrying, 1 = yes, 0 = no clean_up=0 \#removes theVoid directory with individual analysis files, 1 = yes, 0 = no TMP= \#specify a directory other than the system default temporary directory for temporary files
\#-----EVALUATOR Control Options evaluate=0 \#run EVALUATOR on all annotations (very experimental), 1 = yes, 0 = no side_thre=5 eva_window_size=70 eva_split_hit=1 eva_hspmax=100 eva_gspmax=100 enable_fathom=0
